title: HomeKit Weekly: Have an old iPad lying around? Add a $20 wall mount and turn it into a HomeKit controller
content:
Making it easier to work to control my HomeKit accessories is something I am always thinking about. As easy as using the Home app on my iPhone is or turning items off and on with Siri, sometimes you want to make it even easier – especially for guests and non-smart home fans. You could certainly use panel, but what if you want something a bit easier to install? For example, have you considered an old iPad mounted on the wall? Read on to see how easier it is to configure so it can only work in the Home app.

more…

description: Using a $20 wall mount, an old iPad becomes a wall mounted HomeKit controller with easy access to all accessories and cameras.
